No internet connection: No internet connection detected, please connect and try again...
menu.ra_hot.help: Set the activation key for Retroarch combo hotkeys.
menu.ra_hot.opt.0: Set the M/F key as the activation key for Retroarch combo hotkeys.
menu.ra_hot.opt.1: Set the SELECT key as the activation key for Retroarch combo hotkeys.
menu.mode.help: Set the operating mode for the Retroarch emulator. Default is: Mode-1.
menu.mode.opt.0: Mode-1: Player Mode. Suitable for most users. Supports automatic setup of shaders, overlays, rapid fire, combo keys, and other modified system features.
menu.mode.opt.1: Mode-2: Expert Mode. For users who wish to customize all emulator settings themselves. Disables some configuration functions provided by the modified system.
menu.rtgg.help: Press 'L2 + R2 + Down' in a Retroarch game to pause and show the game guide. Press 'M' to return.
menu.rtgg.opt.1: Enable this feature. Hint: Vibration indicates if a guide is available on game start.
menu.shader.help: Customize Retroarch shader functionality. Auto uses preset configs.
menu.shader.opt.0: Disable shaders. Shaders are auto-disabled on game start.
menu.shader.opt.1: Auto-apply preset shaders. Loads preset configs on game start. Manual settings not supported.
menu.shader.opt.2: Manual shader settings. No changes on game start, for users who prefer custom settings.
menu.bezel.help: Customize Retroarch bezel functionality. Bezels are in '/mnt/mmc/anbernic/bezels'.
menu.bezel.opt.0: Disable bezels. Uses core aspect ratio and disables integer scaling.
menu.bezel.opt.1: Auto-load preset bezels. Loads settings from 'default.cfg' on game start. Manual settings not supported.
menu.bezel.opt.2: Manual bezel settings. No changes on game start, for custom settings.
menu.led.opt.0: Disable power LED. LED turns off after system boot.
menu.led.opt.1: Enable power LED. Normal operation mode.
menu.led.opt.2: Auto mode. LED on for frontend, off for games/software. Note: Low battery red might not show.
menu.p_key.help: Set power key function: standby or quick shutdown.
menu.p_key.opt.0: Enter low-power standby on power key press. Note: RG3xxxSP requires 'Super Standby' mode.
menu.p_key.opt.1: Quick shutdown on power key press. In Retroarch, saves progress and restores on next boot.
menu.p_key.opt.2: Combo key mode. Power key alone for standby. 'M + Power' for quick shutdown.
menu.ra_com.help: Use L or R key for combo inputs (e.g., one-button specials).
menu.ra_turbo.help: Set the key to activate turbo in Retroarch. Usage: e.g., Hold A, press L3 to activate A turbo.
menu.ra_turbo.opt.0: Set A as the turbo enable key.
menu.ra_turbo.opt.1: Set B as the turbo enable key.
menu.ra_turbo.opt.2: Set Y as the turbo enable key.
menu.ra_turbo.opt.3: Set X as the turbo enable key.
menu.ra_turbo.opt.4: Set L1 as the turbo enable key.
menu.ra_turbo.opt.5: Set R1 as the turbo enable key.
menu.ra_turbo.opt.6: Set L2 as the turbo enable key.
menu.ra_turbo.opt.7: Set R2 as the turbo enable key.
menu.ra_turbo.opt.8: Set L3 as the turbo enable key.
menu.ra_turbo.opt.9: Set R3 as the turbo enable key.
menu.ra_turbo.opt.10: Disable. Set turbo key manually in Retroarch.
menu.dark.help: Greatly reduces Retroarch game brightness for playing in dark environments.
menu.dark.opt.1: Enable night mode. Note: Only for Retroarch, not frontend or third-party emulators.
menu.varc.help: Set screen orientation for Retroarch vertical arcade (VARCADE) games. Note: Not suitable for all models.
menu.varc.opt.0: Landscape screen, play vertical games horizontally. Smaller image.
menu.varc.opt.1: Landscape screen, rotate vertical game 90 degrees. Larger image, controls may be inconvenient.
menu.aca.help: If default arcade core fails, try others automatically. Remember successful cores.
menu.aca.opt.1: Enable this feature. Hint: May conflict with 'Online Play'. Disable before online gaming.
menu.samba.help: Enable file sharing over WiFi. Access device files from PC to copy games, saves.
menu.samba.opt.1: Enable (persistent). On PC, enter '\\<Device IP>'. Username: root, Password: root.
menu.samba.opt.2: Enable temporarily (disabled after reboot). Prevents connection failure from auto-lock. On PC, enter '\\<Device IP>'. Username: root, Password: root.
menu.ssh.help: SSH protocol for secure remote login and network services.
menu.ssh.opt.2: Enable temporarily (disabled after reboot). Prevents connection failure from auto-lock. Username: root, Password: root.
menu.syn.help: Use Syncthing to sync games and saves between devices over network.
menu.syn.opt.2: Enable temporarily (disabled after reboot). Access via http://<Device IP>:8384
menu.font.help: Switch between default and large font size.
menu.font.opt.1: Use large font. Note: May cause text alignment or overflow issues.
menu.a_lock: Auto Lock Screen & SP Lid Close
menu.p_lock.help: Set action for screen timeout or closing RG3xxxSP lid: standby or quick shutdown.
menu.p_lock.opt.0: Enter standby on screen timeout or lid close. Note: RG3xxxSP requires 'Super Standby'.
menu.p_lock.opt.1: Quick shutdown on screen timeout or lid close. In Retroarch, saves and restores progress.
menu.p_hdmi.help: Set whether to standby when HDMI connected and screen times out or lid closed (RG3xxxSP).
menu.p_hdmi.opt.0: Enter standby on timeout/close even with HDMI connected.
menu.p_hdmi.opt.1: Do not standby on timeout/close when HDMI is connected.
menu.als.help: Automatically load existing saves when starting Retroarch games.
menu.als.opt.1: Enable this feature. Usage: Hold 'A' during game start to skip loading save.
